channel.title: NIBSC Bioinformatics Documentation
channel.description: Recent content on NIBSC Bioinformatics Documentation

item.title: About
item.description: These pages provide documentation describing the pipelines in use by the NIBSC Bioinformatic Core. All code is available on our github repositories: feedbacks and suggestions are welcome.

item.title: Clone Our Repository
item.description: In order to clone our repository, open a terminal and type git clone https://github.com/nibsbioinformatics/core.git This will create a new folder called core which contains all our code. Refere to the specific pages for instructions on how to implement the different elements of our pipeline.
